title: Attention is All You Need to Defend Against Indirect Prompt Injection Attacks in LLMs
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) have been integrated into many applications (e.g., web agents) to perform more sophisticated tasks. However, LLM-empowered applications are vulnerable to Indirect Prompt Injection (IPI) attacks, where instructions are injected via untrustworthy external data sources.
